meanings.definition: To speak in a low, soft voice.
meanings.sent1: She murmured a secret to her friend.
meanings.sent2: The students murmured in the library.
meanings.sent3: The cat murmured a joke to the dog.
meanings.sent4: The wind murmured through the trees like a gentle whisper.
meanings.sent5: He murmured his love for her under the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: The murmur of the river was soothing.
meanings.sent2: A murmur of voices filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The murmur of the coffee machine made him sleepy.
meanings.sent4: The murmur of the crowd was like a distant hum.
meanings.sent5: The murmur of the rain on the roof was peaceful.
